message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn to respond!
You could have taken the 20, now I'm taking 60!
Meet me in the middle! Let's split it 50/50 and end the game.
You wanted 50/50, now I'll give you 30, but I'm keeping 70!
You're taking a bigger share, but I'm still willing to compromise. Take it or leave it!
You wanted 60, now I'll give you 20, but I'm keeping 80, it's my best offer!
You've been pushing me to the limit, but I'm not backing down. Take it or leave it!
You wanted 80, now I'll give you 10, but I'm keeping 90, it's my final offer!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing.
